actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on International Operations.

official_title: A bill to prohibit any individual who has diplomatic immunity from the criminal jurisdiction of the United States from possessing a handgun without the approval of the Secretary of State.

summary.text: Prohibits an individual who is entitled to immunity from the criminal laws of the United States from possessing a handgun without the Secretary of State's approval. States that failure to comply with this requirement shall be grounds for declaring an individual persona non grata.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit any individual who has diplomatic immunity from the criminal jurisdiction of the United States from possessing a handgun without the approval of the Secretary of State.
